item.title: Comment on Tuesday assorted links by (Not That) Bill O'Reilly
item.description:
Without weight loss drugs, Danish gdp growth would be about zero.

Well, no. Without weight loss drugs, the Danish economy would direct investment and resources elsewhere, leading to lower--but probably non-zero!--GDP growth.

Isn't this supposed to be an economics blog?

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/tuesday-assorted-links-493.html?commentID=160842238
